inclusion.criterion: HCV-RNA positive / HBsAg-negative patients with HCC undergoing potentially curative resection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Curative surgery (i.e. no residual tumor intraoperative US and tumor-free margins at pathology)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No recurrence 1 month after surgery (CT, NMR, US)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HCV-RNA positive (lower limit of detection: 100 copies/ml) regardless of blood titers or genotype
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of any active neoplastic site
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous IFN or chemotherapy or treatment of other tumors
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severe surgical complication and/or causes of cirrhosis not related to HCV
exclusion.label: not_met
